Description Page (Shared Variable Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select the Description option in the Category list of the Shared Variable Properties dialog box to display this page. Use this page to include a description with a shared variable.

Note  You can enable descriptions only for network-published shared variables.

This page includes the following components:

  • Enable Description—Enables LabVIEW to include a description with the shared variable.
  • Description—Specifies the description to include with the shared variable.
